| Tool | Language | Category | Stars | Key Features | Install |
|------|----------|----------|-------|--------------|---------|
| [mcp-cli](https://github.com/chrishayuk/mcp-cli) | Python | Mcp Cli Auth | 1700 | Chat Mode - conversational interface with streaming responses, Interactive Mode - command-driven shell interface, Command Mode - Unix-friendly scriptable automation | uvx mcp-cli --help  # Recommended, pip install -e .  # From source |
| [mcptools](https://github.com/f/mcptools) | Go | Mcp Cli Auth | 870 | STDIO transport via JSON-RPC 2.0, HTTP SSE (Server-Sent Events) transport for legacy MCP protocol (2024-11-05), Streamable HTTP transport (modern, recommended for remote servers) | go install github.com/f/mcptools/cmd/mcptools@latest |
| [mcp-proxy (TBXark)](https://github.com/TBXark/mcp-proxy) | Go | Mcp Cli Auth | 585 | Multiple MCP server aggregation, Unified tool/prompt/resource interface, SSE transport support | make build, go install github.com/TBXark/mcp-proxy@latest |
| [linear-mcp-server](https://github.com/jerhadf/linear-mcp-server) | JavaScript | Linear Mcp Server | 339 | Create issues with title, team ID, description, priority (0-4), and status, Update existing issues, Search issues with flexible filtering | `npm i -g npx @smithery/cli install linear-mcp-server --client claude` |
| [mcp-proxy (punkpeye)](https://github.com/punkpeye/mcp-proxy) | TypeScript | Mcp Cli Auth | 204 | stdio to Streamable HTTP conversion, stdio to SSE conversion, CORS enabled by default | npm install mcp-proxy, npm install @punkpeye/mcp-proxy |
| [MCP Proxy Server](https://github.com/adamwattis/mcp-proxy-server) | TypeScript | Proxy Bridge | 182 | Multiple MCP server aggregation, Unified resource interface, Consistent URI schemes | - |

| [mcp-stdio-to-streamable-http-adapter](https://github.com/pyroprompts/mcp-stdio-to-streamable-http-adapter) | TypeScript | Proxy Bridge | - | stdio to Streamable HTTP conversion, Bearer token authentication support, Multiple server configurations | npx @pyroprompts/mcp-stdio-to-streamable-http-adapter |
| [MCP Auth Proxy](https://github.com/sigbit/mcp-auth-proxy) | Go | Proxy Bridge | - | OAuth 2.1 / OIDC authentication, Multiple identity provider support, Google, GitHub, OIDC providers (Okta, Auth0, Azure AD, Keycloak) | Download binary from release page |
| [mcp-proxy](https://github.com/sparfenyuk/mcp-proxy) | Python | Mcp Cli Auth | - | stdio to SSE conversion, SSE to stdio conversion, Bidirectional transport bridging | uv tool install mcp-proxy, pipx install mcp-proxy |
| [mcp-front](https://github.com/stainless-api/mcp-front) | TypeScript | Proxy Bridge | - | Three-level authentication (user-to-proxy, proxy-to-server, per-user tokens), OAuth 2.1 support, Service authentication (serviceAuths) | - |
| [Open MCP Auth Proxy](https://github.com/wso2/open-mcp-auth-proxy) | Go | Proxy Bridge | - | MCP Authorization Specification compliance, JWT validation (signature, audience, scopes), Dynamic authorization | - |

### Mcp Cli Auth

| Tool | Language | Stars | Key Features |
|------|----------|-------|--------------|

| [mcptools](https://github.com/f/mcptools) | Go | 870 | STDIO transport via JSON-RPC 2.0, HTTP SSE (Server-Sent Events) transport for legacy MCP protocol (2024-11-05), Streamable HTTP transport (modern, recommended for remote servers) |
| [mcp-proxy (TBXark)](https://github.com/TBXark/mcp-proxy) | Go | 585 | Multiple MCP server aggregation, Unified tool/prompt/resource interface, SSE transport support |

### Proxy Bridge

| Tool | Language | Stars | Key Features |
|------|----------|-------|--------------|
| [MCP Proxy Server](https://github.com/adamwattis/mcp-proxy-server) | TypeScript | 182 | Multiple MCP server aggregation, Unified resource interface, Consistent URI schemes |
| [mcp-proxy (achetronic)](https://github.com/achetronic/mcp-proxy) | Go | - | Authentication layer, Authorization enforcement, Enterprise features |
| [mcp-streamablehttp-proxy](https://github.com/atrawog/mcp-streamablehttp-proxy) | Python | - | Universal stdio MCP server support, Session management with isolated subprocesses, Full MCP lifecycle support |
| [MCP Bridge](https://github.com/brrock/mcp-bridge) | TypeScript | - | stdio to SSE conversion, stdio to Streamable HTTP conversion, Web management UI |
| [mcp-remote](https://github.com/jms830/mcp-remote) | TypeScript | - | OAuth 2.1 authentication, stdio to remote HTTP bridging, Custom header injection |
| [MCP Gateway](https://github.com/microsoft/mcp-gateway) | Go | - | Reverse proxy for MCP servers, Session-aware stateful routing, MCP server lifecycle management (deploy, update, delete) |
| [MCP OAuth Proxy](https://github.com/obot-platform/mcp-oauth-proxy) | Go | - | OAuth 2.1 authorization server, PKCE support, MCP integration with user context injection |
| [mcp-stdio-to-streamable-http-adapter](https://github.com/pyroprompts/mcp-stdio-to-streamable-http-adapter) | TypeScript | - | stdio to Streamable HTTP conversion, Bearer token authentication support, Multiple server configurations |
| [MCP Auth Proxy](https://github.com/sigbit/mcp-auth-proxy) | Go | - | OAuth 2.1 / OIDC authentication, Multiple identity provider support, Google, GitHub, OIDC providers (Okta, Auth0, Azure AD, Keycloak) |
| [mcp-front](https://github.com/stainless-api/mcp-front) | TypeScript | - | Three-level authentication (user-to-proxy, proxy-to-server, per-user tokens), OAuth 2.1 support, Service authentication (serviceAuths) |
| [Open MCP Auth Proxy](https://github.com/wso2/open-mcp-auth-proxy) | Go | - | MCP Authorization Specification compliance, JWT validation (signature, audience, scopes), Dynamic authorization |

### Tui Client

| Tool | Language | Stars | Key Features |
|------|----------|-------|--------------|
| [lt](https://github.com/markmarkoh/lt) | Rust | - | Git integration, Interactive |
